MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Rake Lane, Eaton Park and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 06.04am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 08.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07.31am on 23rd April 2021
